name: There was never anything to begin with.
name_original: There was never anything to begin with.
description:
This is a game about the origins of things, everything we see, hear and feel around us. Even now, we cannot be for sure what was truly at the beginning, nor what lies for us at the end.

This game aims to recreate that experience as a platformer with an interesting goal: doing nothing, or so one would think… only YOU will be able to find out for sure.
